name: Compli-Cat (Alexius)
description:
Have you ever seen a cat running on two legs? Why does the cat running? Why is he wearing a robe? Why are there so many odd things?

========================================

Welcome to a story where you play as a cat amidst the destruction of the world. A world full of pollution, carbon emissions, waste disposal and Zombies. Compli-Cat is a game that presents a very difficult mechanic to play because it combines Hack n Slash with a touch of Endless Run. The combination of these two things makes for an interesting playing sensation. Welcome to Compli-Cat.
Award:
[2nd Place Winner Game Development at Raion Hackjam 2022]
